title: Conduct Competitor Analysis
description: An agent must research and summarize the strengths and weaknesses of three key competitors identified by the client.

tasks.description: For each of the three competitors, find their latest annual report and Q2 earnings call transcript.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully locates and retrieves the correct documents for all three competitors.

tasks.description: Summarize the key strategic initiatives mentioned in the retrieved documents for each competitor.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a concise summary of each competitor's strategy.

tasks.description: Compile the findings into a table comparing the competitors across key metrics like revenue, market share, and stated strategic goals.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a correctly formatted table with accurate data.
